item.title: Quest Id's (not just those in quest log)
item.dc:creator: @Maizez Maizez
item.description:
@Maizez wrote:

Thank you for that list.

I still need to change the text in the top left corner and the right click text.

The ID I used changes the text in the Quest Log, which is good, but it does not change the text elsewhere in the UI.

I heard this could be Client Sided?

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Id's (not just those in quest log)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Maizez, post:3, topic:444899”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=547579.msg4015039#msg4015039 date=1339546300]
The moparscape client has those enabled if you hover over it. Download an old server, such as winterlove and use it with the moparscape client.
[/quote]

I am using a downloaded 317 client.
Which file would it be to change the text?[/quote]

I dumped a huge list, you can search for them.

http://pastebin.com/rnHFAvis

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Id's (not just those in quest log)
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I’m not sure, but I just ran moparscape and wrote down the ID’s that I really needed at the time to find them. Moparscape 4.0 seems to load slow, so just run Moparscape 3.2. then just hover over the spot and it shows the line id. upper left hand corner

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Id's (not just those in quest log)
item.dc:creator: @Maizez Maizez
item.description:
@Maizez wrote:

Looking for the ID’s of the quests for when they appear in the top left of the screen, and when you right click the quest name.

This is what I have so far…

[code]public void writeQuestTab() {
sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME+" Info", 640);

/Members Quests/
